description: Home Depot has confirmed that it suffered a data breach after one of its SaaS vendors mistakenly exposed a small sample of limited employee data, which could potentially be used in targeted phishing attacks. [...]
title: Home Depot confirms third-party data breach exposed employee info

description: Microsoft is now using a Windows driver to prevent users from changing the Windows 10 and Windows 11 default browser manually or through software. [...]
title: New Windows driver blocks software from changing default web browser
